thread.title: Israel approves huge expansion of settlements
thread.title_full: Israel approves huge expansion of settlements

title: Israel approves huge expansion of settlements
text:
Updated 0742 GMT (1542 HKT) February 1, 2017 
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. New prefabricated homes are seen under construction in the West Bank between the Israeli outpost of Amona and the Israeli settlement of Ofra, north of Ramallah. Story highlights Further expansion of Israeli settlements announced with 3,000 new units planned Move comes as illegal settlement due to be cleared Jerusalem (CNN) Israel is once again ramping up its settlement program, with the announcement of thousands of new units in disputed areas of the West Bank. The government has approved the construction of an additional 3,000 settlement homes in the West Bank, according to a statement from Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Defense Minister Avigdor Liberman. The announcement came late Tuesday in Jerusalem, just a week after 2,500 new settlement homes were approved by the administration. JUST WATCHED
